## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G49250](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G49250)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>DMS3, IDN1</u>
- **Gene Name:** DEFECTIVE IN MERISTEM SILENCING 3, INVOLVED IN DE NOVO 1
- **Description:**   defective in meristem silencing 3;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2082876
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS69174]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No visible phenotype.
   - [dms3-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;WT morphological phenotype. Decreased DNA methylation of target genes.
   - [nuwa-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;All pollen grains of heterozygote plant are viable. Mutation does not affect male gametophyte viability.
   - [nuwa-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;embryo lethal.
   - [nuwa-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;All pollen grains of heterozygote plant are viable. Mutation does not affect male gametophyte viability.
   - [nuwa-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;embryo lethal.
